definition: to advise and teach/to persuade and instruct
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe

sentences.english: Listen to advice and accept instruction, and in the end you will be wise.
sentences.chinese: 你要聽勸教，受訓誨，使你終久有智慧。

sentences.english: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.
sentences.chinese: 你要聽勸教，受訓誨，使你終久有智慧。
